1.0.0.name: wordpress/articalise
1.0.0.description:
If you are writing something that spans multiple posts (e.g. Guide, FAQ, Product Review), and you want to group these posts together. You can still use your usual categories and tags.

The article name is prefixed to the post title and a small 'mini menu' is added at the end, or beginning, of the post.
